name: FARFOR | Study Project
description:
My study project.

This is an urban legend about the nestling Grai, who is trying
to restore his world "Home", absorbed by a dimension called Farfor.

The peculiarity of Farfor is that all the objects that get there 
become fragile white statues. This is what happened to the homeland of Grai. 

However, if you take the statue out of Farfor, 
it will become real again.

Therefore, Gry repeatedly goes there
to find the objects of his world and bring them back.
